agendaPreview.noBookingText: You don’t currently have any bookings for this day. Go ahead and fill your boots!

activities.shortDescription: For help using our app, head to our help desk.
activities.longDescription: Our app is a one-stop-shop for all your voyage needs. But if you need any assistance at all using or navigating it, our help desk has you covered.
activities.introduction: Need help with our mobile app? Our help desk will be able to assist you.

activities.displayName: Box Office: Shows Reservation Help Desk
activities.shortDescription: Book your show reservations with ease.
activities.longDescription: Book show tickets and get all your box office questions answered at our shows reservation help desk.
activities.introduction: Our show reservations help desk is here to assist you with all your box office needs.

activities.displayName: Guest Artist: Matthew Lennox - Solo Guitarist
activities.shortDescription: Sail to the beat from a rhythmic folk-rocker.
activities.longDescription: When percussive fingerstyle guitar meets beatboxing meets cinematic sensibilities, you get Matthew Lennox — a Canadian musician who will transport you on a powerful, evocative journey through musical storytelling. Speaking from his experiences as a globetrotting street musician, you’ll be catapulted into a rhythmic experience like no other.
activities.introduction: A one-man juggernaut does it all from beatboxing to flamenco folk-rock.

activities.displayName: Squid Ink Tattoos & Piercings — Bookings Now Open
activities.shortDescription: Score a (permanent) souvenir with new body art.
activities.longDescription: Keep your sailing memories on display with a (more) permanent keepsake by adding some body art. Our tattoo artists and piercing specialists have been hand-picked by tattoo industry legend Lou Rubino Jr. — the visionary behind World Famous Tattoo Ink, Soho Ink and Freshly Inked Magazine. Our artists can help customize a design,  or you can select from a catalog — and we have studs, bars and hoops to proudly show off if a piercing is more your style. Book early — spaces fill up quickly.
activities.introduction: Remember your voyage by adding some sweet body and face art in the first-at-sea tattoo and piercing parlor — space is limited.
instructionDetails: Medical consent form is required prior to appointment
Squid Ink has a rigorous hygiene policy and a 5 star rating
Tattoo will be covered with Dermshield, allowing the tattoo to breathe and heal
While Dermshield is water protective, it is not recommended Sailors submerge in water
A $200 non-refundable deposit will be taken for tattoo appointments at time of booking
Adding to agenda does not confirm booking, please visit the studio

activities.shortDescription: A character-focused comedian from Edinburgh.
activities.longDescription: Hailing from Edinburgh, Joe McTernan has gained national acclaim throughout the UK and online. He's become famous for his character-based sketches, and for his appearance on BBC Scotland TV show "The Comedy Underground." He also starred and co-wrote the online sitcom M.U.F.F. Now he's bringing his comedic talents to Virgin Voyages, so get ready to laugh the night away.
activities.introduction: Joe McTernan is an energetic comedian who's toured all over the world performing character-based sketches.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: A vibrant pianist and singer.
activities.longDescription: Kyle Esplin is a vibrant pianist and singer who makes a piano ring like no other. His all-action live show includes a wide range of genres, from classical to rock n' roll and more, and simply has to be seen to be believed. Kyle has recorded 6 CDs to date and regularly performs all over the world. Before the night is over, Kyle guarantees to have our Showroom Rockin' and Rollin!
activities.introduction: Dive into this all-action live piano show that covers everything from classical to rock n' roll!
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Trivia with a Virgin twist.
activities.longDescription: Teams get together to play rounds of trivia for the chance to fill your jar with golden barnacles. One Sailor from the winning team of each round will get a chance to face what we call “Trial-by-Trivia” and spin the wheel. Will you lose a team member? Have the chance to sing for extra points? With wild challenges and hilarious twists, it’s far from your average trivia game.
activities.introduction: Pop on some socks, a white button-down and shades and slide into this far-from-average trivia game.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.displayName: Live Life Colorfully ft. the Art of Verena Cram
activities.shortDescription: Turn a black and white mural into full technicolor
activities.longDescription: Color inside the lines — or outside. Really, color wherever you want besides the sides of the ship (we pay people to paint those). This get-together is all about vibes. Enjoy some music, sip something and chat with your fellow artistes, and jump into this collaborative art project based on an original work by Mexico-based Happening cast member Verena Cram. We'll bring the art supplies, you bring the creativity.
activities.introduction: In this interactive experience with The Artist, you'll bring life to an undersea image by Verena Cram, one of Virgin Voyages' own Happenings cast.

activities.shortDescription: A zen-seeking, chakra-balancing morning.
activities.longDescription: Start your morning with the most calming and balancing energy — mats laid down and ready for your arrival. After some body work, chimes indicate a transition from sun salutation to partner work in an introduction to the human subtle system, which consists of energy centers (Chakras) and the spiritual energy (Kundalini). Feel free to Namaste for a while.
activities.introduction: Start your morning at with sun salutations, chakra balancing and personal affirmations.
instructionDetails: Wear reef-safe sunscreen since this will take place outside.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
If the weather isn't on our side (we don't anticipate it, but it happens), we'll meet inside at B-Complex (Build & Balance) on deck 15.

activities.displayName: Shore Talk: Introduction to Walvis Bay
activities.shortDescription: Walvis Bay 101: Everything You Need to Know.
activities.longDescription: Get an introduction to the rich history and culture of Walvis Bay with our resident Africa expert David van Niekerk. You'll learn all about the desert climate and its effect on the culture of local tribes like the Herero and Ovambo, plus get a crash course in the region's currency and close ties to South Africa.
activities.introduction: Learn about the climate, currency, and some of Walvis Bay's unique local tribes like the Ovambo and Herero with Africa expert David van Niekerk.

activities.shortDescription: Compete in the ultimate jigsaw puzzle competition.
activities.longDescription: All those years of puzzling will finally piece together during the ultimate jigsaw puzzle challenge. With commentary provided by the Gamer, you and your teammates will take on a 300 piece jigsaw puzzle and race to see who figures it out first, thus becoming the ultimate Puzzle Master.
activities.introduction: Do you have what it takes to compete in one of the biggest puzzle competitions on the water? We’d like to sea you try.

activities.shortDescription: An assembly drill for ship safety.
activities.longDescription: We know, we know—the logistical stuff. But don't worry, we've even given this the Virgin makeover. Roll Call will cover everything you need to know in case of an emergency while on board—who to call, what to do and where to go. To ensure a quick experience, please watch the very Virgin safety video in the VV app or the TV in your cabin before you arrive at Roll Call. Trust us. It's a can't-miss event. Literally. Legally. No, seriously!
activities.introduction: Head to the Assembly Station for a mandatory safety briefing and overview of the onboard protocol in case of an emergency.
instructionDetails: This is required
Please watch the safety vid on on your app or on your cabin television.

activities.displayName: HIIT! (Don't Quit) Class - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Improve your flexibility in slow flow yoga class.
activities.longDescription: With a focus on improving flexibility and breath, our traditional slow-flow yoga class consists of slow-flowing, strength-building movements and are punctuated by quiet moments of reflection. Sailors of all levels are welcome.
activities.introduction: Open your heart... specifically to heart-openers at slow-flow yoga.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.displayName: Festival Stage: Tom Crosbie - Performing Nerd
activities.shortDescription: Promises to be unlike anything you've seen before.
activities.longDescription:
Tom has made a living for the last 10 years traveling the world with his collection of completely useless skills. This promises to be a funny & charming show from one of Britain's most in demand variety stars! With a show that will be like nothing you've ever seen before, join Tom as he takes the scenic route to self-improvement, as he masters the talents nobody knew he needed.

"One of the most incredible things I've ever watched!" - Simon Cowell
activities.introduction: Come find out what makes Tom one of Britain's most in demand variety stars!
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: An informal educational art class.
activities.longDescription: Join the Artist at the Draught Haus for an educational art class designed for all skill levels looking for either an intro into the world of art or an opportunity to hone their skills. Sailors will learn how to use the tools needed for a variety of artistic styles, so you can go home and impress your friends with your newfound art ability.
activities.introduction: Learn still lifes, figure drawings, and shading techniques, in this introductory art class.

activities.shortDescription: Pub crawl kicking off at Sip Lounge.
activities.longDescription: This traveling-pub-crawl-slash-moving-party begins at Sip Lounge, then weaves you through the ship’s can't-miss bars and spots. You'll enjoy a bevvie and snack (on us) at one of our four stops — with special missions at each locale. It’s all about connecting with other Sailors and finding your people. Oh, and don't forget to look chic, you'll be in good company.
activities.introduction: If you feel like a siren of sea travel, join us on a pub crawl perfect for the whimsical, seafaring Sailors among us.
instructionDetails: There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know of any food allergies and/or dietary requirements.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: A look through the lens of mid-century musicals.
activities.longDescription: From Gene Kelly and Cyd Charisse to Vera-Ellen and Fred Astaire, so many iconic dancers brought the magic of dance to the big screen as motion pictures took over in the middle of the 20th century. "While You're Dancing" takes you through film history's most memorable musical dance numbers. Enjoy musical numbers from films like "Singin' in the Rain", "Bandwagon", "Gentlemen Prefer Blondes", and many more, while Sydney and Kal take you on a journey that is 'Too Darn Hot'!
activities.introduction: Journey through musical film history with some of Hollywood's most memorable moments.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring Guest DJ Ella - "70s, 80s & More"

activities.shortDescription: Join The Casino Crew for lessons before we open.
activities.longDescription: Head to The Casino to learn a new game, get your questions answered, or simply get to know The Casino Crew on a personal level. Not only will you get some practice in before gaming kicks off, you'll have an opportunity to win free-play just for stopping by. And if you're feeling intimidated because you don’t know how to play (yet), our Crew would love to show you the ropes. Whether you want to learn craps, blackjack, poker, or slots — they know their ship.
activities.introduction: You're invited to come meet The Casino Crew before we open — while learning and practicing any of our games before it's time to get the dice rolling.
instructionDetails: The Casino is located on Deck 6 forward.
You'll be able to learn how to use your wearable, The Band, to earn rewards — so don't forget it.

activities.shortDescription: Discover the world's latest sports obsession.
activities.longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. All you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
activities.introduction: Quick to learn, social, and a lot of fun, Pickleball is a fast-paced sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and ping-pong.

activities.shortDescription: Challenge your mind with some morning brain games.
activities.longDescription: If you’re a morning person (even if morning means 1 pm), it’s never too late to start your day with some brain games. Come solo, bring a friend, or grab your squad, and prepare yourself for some mind melting challenges that range from riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes and more psyche-satisfying games to get your inner wheels turning.
activities.introduction: Swap coffee for mind benders (or do both!) and start your day off right-brained (or left) with mind-bending brain teasers.

activities.shortDescription: Our take on a classic college party.
activities.longDescription: Amping up the competition a notch, this is a twist on classic college party games like air hockey, foosball, boxing rings, swings, and custom twists on beer pong, and water war. Teams may be matched up by where they’re from, interests, professions or favorite bevs. Winners will have bragging rights and potentially a hangover (…we’re not in college anymore).
activities.introduction: From seesaws to pong bombs—it's a tournament for the rowdy and competitive Sailor.
instructionDetails: Wear comfortable clothes and reef-safe sunscreen since you'll be outside.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.displayName: Festival Stage: Aka & Gvantsa Dancer Duo
activities.shortDescription: A ballroom and Latin American dance show.
activities.longDescription: Aka and Gvantsa are a dancing duo taking the world by storm. They've been dancing together since childhood, and even won the World Championships of show dancing in 2023. Expect creative lifts and intense emotion, in their ballroom and Latin American dance routines.
activities.introduction: Prepare to be amazed by the rhythmic moves of Aka and Gvantsa as they glide around the dance floor.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Offbeat original comic songs and parodies.
activities.longDescription: Hailing from the UK, comedian and sought after headliner, Andy Askins delights audiences far and wide with his offbeat original songs and parodies. With setups that rival other comedians' punchlines, you'll have an absolute blast taking in Askins' hilarious and witty musical numbers.
activities.introduction: Andy Askins hails from the UK and delights audiences far and wide with his original comic songs and parodies.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Settle in for a night of Nintendo Switch favorites
activities.longDescription: Nintendo Switch Night in the Social Club is a chance for you to get your game on and test your skills against loved ones or other Sailors. It's a great way to meet new friends, settle old gaming grudges, and prove once and for all that you're actually as good at Mario Kart and Smash Bros as you think you are.
activities.introduction: Whether you're looking for a casual game night or a tournament-style melee, head to the Social Club for a night of Nintendo Switch.

activities.displayName: Social Walk with the Happenings Cast

activities.shortDescription: Live to play, play to win — big.
activities.longDescription: With plenty of space and games to choose from, make (money) moves to the casino ‘cause the slots are open. From classic faves to slot tournaments, there’s a chance you may end up heading home with some extra cash — besides a tan and amazing new memories.
activities.introduction: Make the most of your exclusively adult voyage by heading over to the (now opened) casino slots.

activities.displayName: Book Club at Sea - The Immortalists by Chloe Benjamin
Shore Things - Explore and book your excursions.

activities.shortDescription: Shopping is an art — let your creativity soar.
activities.longDescription: Vacation is about rest, relaxation...and retail therapy. With curated collections of Swiss watches, unique jewelry, fragrances, and essential items — discover new-at-sea boutique fashion, sustainable brands, and lots of VV merch. From hand woven hammocks that empower women in business, to reef-safe sunscreen — at least 25% of our onboard brands have made a commitment to a positive social or environmental impact.
activities.introduction: Now that the shops are open, you’ll find everything you need to gift your loved ones, but most importantly, yourself.

activities.shortDescription: Chocolate worship and pastry workshop.
activities.longDescription: A mix between chocolate worship and pastry workshop, this mouthwatering culinary demo is a treat for anyone who loves baked sweets, so get ready to elevate your dessert game and satisfy your cravings. Awaken your inner chocolatier and join us on an indulgent journey through the world of luscious flavors, rich textures, and tantalizing aromas as we discover the art of making exquisite chocolate pralines and irresistible rocher treats.
activities.introduction: Dive into the world of pastry-making to learn how to create heavenly sweets that’ll take your dessert game to another level.
instructionDetails: Please note this event may be filmed for Virgin Voyages' marketing materials.
By attending this event, you consent to photography, video recording, and its release for promotional purposes.
This activity is not in a nut free environment.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Start your day with fellow solo Sailors.
activities.longDescription: Enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues.)
activities.introduction: Let us jump-start your morning with coffee — and a mixer to connect you with other solo Sailors.

activities.displayName: Gut On Track: Wellness Workshop - Book On Board!
Book Club at Sea - Circe by Madeline Miller
Behind the Glimmer of Lab-Grown Diamonds
activities.shortDescription: Learn all about lab-grown diamonds.
activities.longDescription: Lab-grown diamonds feel and look just like earth-grown diamonds, but there are several important differences. This educational event is all about lab-grown diamonds. You'll learn how they're created, and why they're more ethical and sustainable. And if you choose to purchase any onboard, you'll save on tax and duty free pricing.
activities.introduction: Sip champagne while you learn all about the ethics, sustainability, and creation of lab-grown diamonds.

activities.shortDescription: A parody of the classic “Mexican Bingo” game.
activities.longDescription: Lotería Gigante is our favorite new game show where contestants learn how to make (and drink) 2 of the world's most beloved agave cocktails while playing Millennial Lotería — a hilarious parody of the classic Latinx game "Lotería." But there’s a twist: at Loteria Gigante, everyone's a winner because your entry ticket already comes with a margarita and paloma. ¡Salud!
activities.introduction: Get ready for this lady-ship comedically-inspired fiesta curated by Unfiltered Hospitality.
instructionDetails: Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.displayName: Around the World in 80 Minutes with The Diva
activities.shortDescription: An over-the-top drag cabaret you'll never forget.
activities.longDescription: Our fabulous drag queen, the Diva, is here and she is ready to take you on a journey around the world through song, stories, ridiculousness and, of course, lots and lots of lewks. Grab a cocktail and join The Diva in the Manor for an experience unlike anything you've ever seen at sea. Or on land for that matter.
activities.introduction: The Diva has arrived, and ma'am, she is serving.
instructionDetails: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Reserving seats for Sailors who are not present at the venue is not allowed.

activities.displayName: Book Club at Sea - The Library Book by Susan Orlean
Tournamentys: The One with Texas Hold'em
activities.shortDescription: Tournament-style game of Hold'em.
activities.longDescription: Shipwide, the lights will dim to a gentle red and you’ll know Scarlet Night is nigh. If you make your way over to the casino, you’ll notice it’s a different kind of red—a rustic, Texas red to match the Texas Hold’em tournament going down. So secure your red bolo, collect your red chips and prepare for a fiery win.
activities.introduction: On Scarlet Night everything is red—and that’s no exception in the casino, where the fire is burning Texas-style.

activities.displayName: On-the-Upswing Bungee Class - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Tone, strengthen, and stretch.
activities.longDescription: In the scenic setting of The Perch, The Balancer will walk you through a workout that combines elements of barre, pilates, and yoga for a full-body strengthening and toning experience. Wrap up with a long, restorative stretch to promote circulation and get you on the right foot for whatever your day has in store.
activities.introduction: Take a restorative, invigorating class with a view of the ocean.

activities.displayName: Roll-Out and Recover Class - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Relaxed Mediterranean vibes and an ocean breeze.
activities.longDescription: At The Dock, we're serving up Balearic beats, tropical house, and soulful global grooves — music engineered to keep you in a zen state of mind for a maximum amount of time.
activities.introduction: Daybeds, open air, and views of the ship's wake provide the perfect atmosphere to chill — with musical accompaniment designed to match the mood.

activities.displayName: Origin Story: Core Basics Class - Book On Board!
Open-Heart Slow Flow Yoga - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Listen the best tunes of history.
activities.longDescription: Spend the night with Peruvian piano player and experienced cruise ship musician Gabriel Rios for a night of classic tunes. Gabriel mastered styles such as jazz, blues, rock, pop, Latin, bossa nova, show tunes, and more for a performance style that will suit anyone who wants to hear an accomplished pianist at their craft.
activities.introduction: Take a stroll through music history with piano player Gabriel Rios, whose mastery of genre is unmatched.

activities.displayName: Growth and Guided Meditation - Book On Board!

activities.shortDescription: Six cocktails. Two bartenders. One raucous party.
activities.longDescription: Bottoms up! Come ready to taste the finest cocktails our mixologists can whip up during three themed rounds of competition: one focused on drinks with fresh-squeezed juice, one with a spicy kick, and one final showcase of drink-mixing skill and flair. Sailors will vote on the winners for each round and crown a champion at the end — but with six different taster cocktails and music to dance to, no one's going home empty-handed. Stick around afterwards for a mixer.
activities.introduction: Sit back and watch Virgin's world-class bartenders engage in a mix-off to win your heart.
instructionDetails: Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.displayName: Time for a Treat: History of Timepieces
activities.shortDescription: The history of watches from Swiss timepiece expert
activities.longDescription: Our highly-curated and specialized meet-up led by Swiss timepiece experts is for those of you on board who have all the time in the world to tell time. Join us for this historical chat that involves a Q&A plus some one on one time for you to ask any and all questions about the complexities of creating a modern Swiss watch. Just be sure to be…on time.
activities.introduction: Join our Swiss timepiece experts for a history of all things watches — a timely treat for the true enthusiasts on board.

activities.shortDescription: It's an onboard karaoke night, Sailors.
activities.longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.
activities.introduction: Sing your heart out, Sailors.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring Guest DJ Leo Medina "Disco Tunes"

activities.shortDescription: A mindful practice of guided meditation in a group
activities.longDescription: Embark on a journey of healing, deep relaxation and spiritual awareness as you join us on a guided meditation. Follow along as you are invited to relax the body and mind —transforming the roaring waves of the subconscious into a tranquil oasis and learning mindful practices you can take off the ship with you. Sailors of all levels are welcome to join.
activities.introduction: Let this guided meditation class be your daily mantra for reflection, vibration leveling and intention setting.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.shortDescription: Exclusive 2.5-hours tour of our lady ship.
activities.longDescription: Get an exclusive look into our operations in a 2.5-hours behind-the-scenes tour with 10+ stops across our lady ship. Visiting areas reserved for our Crew and top-secret spaces you’ve never even dreamed of, you’ll learn the creeds we live by, sea how we create a one-of-a-kind experience for our Sailors. That’s all we can say for now, but if we could add one thing more, it’d be “you won’t want to miss this.”
activities.meetingPlaceName: On the Rocks, Deck 6 Roundabout, Deck 6
activities.introduction: Peek through the velvet curtain and discover how we Make Ship Happen in an exclusive tour across your lady ship.
instructionDetails: Certain non-Sailor facing areas might have limited accessibility, please contact Sailor Service for information before booking.
Closed toe shoes must be worn on this tour.
activities.deckLocation: On the Rocks, Deck 6 Roundabout, Deck 6

activities.displayName: Plate, Snap, Eat: Foodie Photo Workshop
activities.shortDescription: A culinary plating, photography, and dining event.
activities.longDescription: In this bottomless brunch Test Kitchen workshop, The Foodie will take you through a multi-step lesson on plating, presentation and photographing your chosen meal — before digging in and devouring your esthetical edibles. You’ll leave with all the sacred tools necessary for making food look as good as it tastes on social media… because let’s be honest, it rarely translates.
activities.introduction: It’s all about the ‘gram, baby. And with picture perfect presentation, you can leave the filters for the “influencers.”
instructionDetails: Space is limited, so make sure to make your reservation here.
There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know about any dietary restrictions or allergies.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: A high intensity HIIT Pilates class.
activities.longDescription: This HIIT Pilates class combines traditional Pilates movement with the intensity of interval training, all with a stunning ocean view. Feel strong while getting your heart rate up and breaking a sweat. This class is accessible for beginners and advanced exercise gurus.
activities.introduction: A heart-pumping HIIT Pilates class at The Perch.

activities.shortDescription: Test your cruise IQ.
activities.longDescription: Is your cruising knowledge as deep as the Atlantic? Or does it resemble the shallow shoreline waters? Either way, kick back and enjoy some little known cruising trivia with Arnie Skelton, plus learn fun facts about the very ship that you're on! Presented in quiz form, you can test just how steady your nautical knowledge really is!
activities.introduction: Delight in cruising trivia with Arnie Skelton and test your nautical knowledge with a fun quiz about the industry and the ship you're sailing on.

activities.shortDescription: A workout so fun, you won't realize it's exercise.
activities.longDescription: If dragging yourself to the gym just isn't how you want to spend your Virgin Voyage but you’d like to break a sweat, this event is for you. Zumba is more party than fitness class, set to a contagious blend of Latin and international rhythms that provides a fun and effective workout. Developed in Colombia, this method combines low-intensity and high-intensity moves for an interval-style, calorie-burning dance party. It's every bit as feel-good as an 80s music video, but the leotard is optional.
activities.introduction: Half dance party + half aerobics session = a full-body workout that will leave you feeling bouncy and energized.

activities.shortDescription: Creations and libations with the Artist.
activities.longDescription: Join the Artist for an hour of creating custom art — all while enjoying some bottomless bubbles. You don't have to be good at art, trust us, you just have to like having a good time (and you will).
activities.introduction: Everyone's a better artist with a drink or two... so let's pop bottles while we pop a bit of color.
instructionDetails: There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know about any dietary restrictions or allergies.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Park dazzles with guitar riffs and violin loops.
activities.longDescription: To survive multiple residencies in the ultra-competitive performer mecca of Las Vegas, talent isn’t a mere asset — it’s a requirement. Luckily, crooner and guitar virtuoso Daniel Park oozes the stuff. From Lily Bar & Lounge at the Bellagio Hotel, to Mandarin Bar at the Mandarin Oriental, audiences all over Vegas have been captivated by Park’s melodic voice and thoughtful lyrics. Hot off his latest stint at the Rosewood in Phnom Penh, this seasoned chanteur is turning his eye to the high seas.
activities.introduction: This soulful folk balladeer with a modern twist bares it all in his intimate shows.

activities.shortDescription: A dance class that gets your hips grooving.
activities.longDescription: This remixed dance class on The Perch is all about getting your feet moving and putting you in the party mindset. Learn 2-step dances like the cha cha, the grapevine, and other adult-friendly moves, grooving to music that's sure to keep the deck bopping.
activities.introduction: Learn popular dances ranging from the cha cha to the grapevine, courtesy of our onboard dance pros.

activities.displayName: Beyond Tequila: Rituals and Stories of a Mezcalier
activities.shortDescription: Agave 101: the origins of tequila and mezcal.
activities.longDescription: With The Foodie and our resident Mixologist at the helm — and by helm we mean bar — embark on a journey from Tequila Sunrise to Midnight by Mezcal, celebrating the history, rituals, and tastes of Mexico’s most spirited, well, spirits. With a selection of our lady ship’s finest labels, discover why the heart of the agave plant is what breathes life into everyone’s favorite cocktails.
activities.introduction: From the heart of the agave plant to the mind of the Mezcalier — go through the origins, history, and rituals of  Mexico’s iconic spirits.
instructionDetails: There is a charge for this event.
Please let the host know about any dietary restrictions or allergies.
Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Master White Wine Tasting in 60 Minutes.
activities.longDescription: Discover the art of wine tasting in 60 minutes with White Wine: Master the Art of Tasting. Learn to identify subtle notes and nuances, and explore what contributes to wine's quality and taste through expert-led tastings through five varietals.
activities.introduction: Unlock the art of wine tasting in an hour. Learn to identify notes and nuances with expert-led tastings in White Wine: Master The Art of Tasting.
instructionDetails: Please note this event may be filmed for Virgin Voyages' marketing materials
By attending this event, you consent to photography, video recording, and its release for promotional purposes

activities.shortDescription: Get down with the Balancer and pump it up.
activities.longDescription: For fitness fanatics — or those looking to give working out a try before getting roped into a gym membership — the Balancer is here to push you (without being pushy) during this guided full-out cardio session. Whether you're a beginner or have tons of experience — get down in the judgment-free zone with this circuit based interval training sesh that will be sure to get your heart rate up, your sweat flowing, and that glimmering feeling of true hard work.
activities.introduction: Get your heart rate pumping with a little bit (or a lot, if you prefer) of cardio in this fast-paced course for all fitness levels.

activities.shortDescription: Compete in knockout against your fellow Sailors.
activities.longDescription: Let's throw it all the way back to high school gym class, and those heated games of knockout you used to play. Embrace your inner kid again with our Knockout Hoops competition, where Sailors compete against each other to make the most free throws in a row. The bragging rights are real, and they're not just for kids...
activities.introduction: Join the Bounce for a classic game of knockout at the sports court. Make the most shots in a row, and win!

activities.displayName: DJ Kolarz at the Dock House "Motown Moments"

activities.shortDescription: Break a sweat as a team in this two-person workout
activities.longDescription: Sweating is always better as a duo. Whether it's your spouse, friend, sibling, or distant cousin, grab a trusted partner and work out as a team. Each exercise requires two people, so get ready to share the connection of getting stronger together through this mix of physically assisting and strengthening.
activities.introduction: A team workout designed to get you and your partner moving.

activities.displayName: DJ Ella at the Dock House "Motown Moments"

activities.shortDescription: A rousing game of dogeball at the b-ball court.
activities.longDescription: After laying out the rules, the games begin and teams begin to be eliminated with each passing round. The Balancer will host this event, and announce the victor at the end of the match. Gotta. Dodge. 'Em. All.
activities.introduction: Blue Ballers vs. Dirty Dodgers vs. Beastie Ballers vs. Artful Dodgers — it’s a spritely game of dodgeball.
instructionDetails: Wear close-toed shoes and athletic clothes (because... sports)
In case it in isn't obvious, you will, in fact, be hit with balls.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.shortDescription: An exciting musical duo from Barbados.
activities.longDescription: Taking you from Bob Marley to Rihanna, dance hits to lounge tunes, Ocean Eyes does it all. This husband and wife duo from Barbados delivers their performance through the vibrant sounds of guitar and cajon, coupled with their harmonious vocals. You'll never know what to expect with their random inclusion of musical games, story telling and "odd" genre combinations. Just know, you're in for a special treat.
activities.introduction: Husband & wife duo combining modern pop, the classic, jazz and more with their Caribbean, Barbados flavor ~ Not your everyday acoustic music.

activities.shortDescription: Take a peek inside the ultimate self-care refuge.
activities.longDescription: Thinking about making wellness part of *this* journey? Head over to Redemption Spa to see how. With restorative spaces and stylish surroundings, this self-care haven features a mud room, salt room, sauna, and steam room — plus hot and cold plunge pools for the ultimate dose of Vitamin Sea. This session gives you the chance to talk to our Crew about how you can get the maximum restorative experience by visiting the spaces where the ultimate self-care journey is waiting for you to begin yours.
activities.introduction: Wellness isn’t about the destination — but our Thermal Suite is the perfect restorative stop along your journey.

activities.shortDescription: Get glam, glittered, & sparkled for an epic night.
activities.longDescription: For our luminous nights under the stars, our glam patrol is here to elevate your on-deck esthetic for one sensational night at sea. Make-up. Glitter. Face and body gems — however you want to maximize your look, our glamor-azzi team is here to help you make it happen. Make sure to arrive soon, as it is first come, first served!
activities.introduction: Add a little (or a lot) of sparkle to your already sparkling night...

activities.shortDescription: A man and an hour of jaw-dropping magic.
activities.longDescription: Mark Spelmann is a magician's magician. His commitment to the craft led to the creation of his alter ego, Magician X, who performs masked to protect his identity. X has electrified crowds for years, first doing anonymous tricks for unwitting passers-by in London and eventually expanding his repertoire into a gripping visual show that has stunned international audiences (including viewers of both Britain's Got Talent and America's Got Talent). Now, he's dazzling fans in international waters.
activities.introduction: Inspired by artist Banksy, Marc Spelmann started out as a London street performer before becoming an overnight sensation on Britain's Got Talent.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.

activities.shortDescription: Libations and (glamorous) musical vibrations.
activities.longDescription: On The Rocks is the most electric nightclub at sea, but with the Hostess. You'll be treated to table and bar service with access to the On The Rocks mixology-forward spirits including classic cocktails to new age libation creations. With your drink in hand, rejoice in The Hostess’s collection of songs and stories — the perfect blend of red hot revelry aboard our red hot lady ship.
activities.introduction: Being the head-turning-diamond, dripping-glam goddess she is, The Hostess will treat you to old school twists on new school tunes.
instructionDetails: This event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

activities.shortDescription: Bites, beats, and libations at Pink Agave.
activities.longDescription: Get your glow on in Pink Agave’s after hours agave lounge. With our resident DJ setting the mood to start your night on the right foot — or end it (dancing) in style.
activities.introduction: With our resident DJ mixing it up, join us at Pink Agave for a celebration of life, CDMX food, and the largest tequila and mezcal collection at sea.

activities.displayName: Live Painting Demo with the Artist
Klub Rubiks: Not your average 80s party
activities.shortDescription: Not your average 80s party.
activities.longDescription: Don your favorite 80s fashion and join our Happenings Cast on the dance floor as we explore our favorite bits about this unforgettable decade. Like, don't be a dweeb and let's have a totally tubular night to the max.
activities.introduction: A celebration of the most loved & hated decade.
instructionDetails: Just FYI, strobe lights, lasers and CO2 effects will be used. If that is an issue for anyone, please be advised.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.

activities.displayName: Guest Artist: M.K. Quintet ft. Ms. Azure MCCall
activities.shortDescription: A dynamic and upbeat jazz quintet.
activities.longDescription: Manny Kellough leads this all-star quintet featuring the incredible stylings of vocalist, Azure McCall. The M.K. Quintet performs classic jazz compositions as well as lively pop hits that have entertained audiences worldwide. Now they're coming to the Virgin Voyages stage!
activities.introduction: Upscale jazz quintet led by world class drummer Manny Kellough.

activities.displayName: West African Characters with Arnie Skelton
activities.shortDescription: Main players in West African culture and history.
activities.longDescription: Gain an in-depth understanding of West Africa's history and culture by learning about key players in the region's political, tribal, and artistic spheres. Arnie Skelton will introduce you to characters who are emblematic and represent the wide-reaching global impact of West Africa, helping weave together the beautiful and complex history of the area.
activities.introduction: Join Arnie Skelton as he dives into the history and culture of West Africa and introduces you to the region's main characters.

activities.shortDescription: A mildly caffeinated educational experience.
activities.longDescription: We've been sipping tea and enjoying its benefits for at least 6,000 years — trillions of sips. But why? Join our Crew at Test Kitchen and learn about the origin of tea and its categories, how to analyze and taste its four main styles, and get an inside look into our partner-ship with JoJo Tea. After this 60-minute experience specially designed for tea lovers, you'll never see a humble cuppa the same way again.
activities.introduction: Heat Water. Make Tea. Connect with others and soothe your soul.
instructionDetails: Reservations will be held until 10 minutes after the start time and if unclaimed by then, they will be released and no refunds given.
If you have a Virgin Voyages Shore Thing booked, please allow sufficient time between the Shore Thing and the booked event in the case of delays.

activities.shortDescription: Not your average Pub-style trivia game.
activities.longDescription: The Happenings Cast compiles the best of pop culture, history, current events and beyond in a uniquely multi-round trivia event created for your voyage. Each team will have a booklet to fill out for each round of 10 questions. But this isn’t your average trivia game—this Salty Trivia expands beyond generations, giving you the freshest, funniest brain-twisters you can find on the open ocean (or anywhere, for that matter).
activities.introduction: A pub-style trivia game in the Loose Cannon—created uniquely each day.
instructionDetails: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

activities.displayName: DJ Kolarz at the Aquatic Club
activities.shortDescription: A splash of afternoon sunshine.
activities.longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill, non-explicit variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.
activities.introduction: Vibe out in the midday sun with strangers, lovers, and everyone in between.

activities.shortDescription: Grab your bingo cards before the game.
activities.longDescription: Make your way to the stage to purchase as many bingo cards as you want. As you enter, you’ll notice the DJ already has the place bumping and in full party mode — accompanied by gorgeous lighting and videos to set the mood. Trust us; you're going to want in on these games.
activities.introduction: Head to The Red Room prior to bingo to purchase your cards and get the (bingo) party started.
instructionDetails: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

activities.displayName: Tournamentys: The One with the Slots
activities.shortDescription: Tournament-style game of slots.
activities.longDescription: It’s a slot tournament with a Virgin twist. When you sign up for the tournament, you’re assigned a slot machine number and a session time to play. When it’s your time, head to your machine and wait for our cast to tell you when to start—and it’s off to the slot-slinging races for you. It’s the perfect opportunity to meet other Sailors and maybe even make some extra ca$h.
activities.introduction: The excitement of opening night is permeating the whole ship—including the casino, so head to the slots for the sweet sounds of your future winnings.

activities.shortDescription: A mixology course with guided photography.
activities.longDescription: Join us at the Test Kitchen for mixology experience where you'll learn what it takes to create cocktails using fresh fruit and vegetables, herbs, house-made mixers, flavored bitters and extracts from around the world. Oh, and obviously, with top-shelf spirits and liquor. The Foodie and the resident mixologist will guide you through the development of cocktails, from bar tools to garnishing, finishing with the most important part—snapping the most envy-inducing and share-worthy pics to Instagram.
activities.introduction: Mix, measure and muddle your way to creating three signature cocktails that are perfect for sipping and snapping.

activities.shortDescription: Summertime arts and  crafts.
activities.longDescription: Friendship bracelets, keychains & potholders - throwing it waaayyyy back to the good old days of summer camp arts & crafts.
activities.introduction: Do the words “compete”, ”sports”, or “race” give you anxiety? Fear not — this craft sesh was made for all you creative (inner) kids.

activities.shortDescription: Casual encounters with the ship's resident charmer
activities.longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by the impromptu close-up magic, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you in. So keep your eyes peeled; these roaming magic performances throughout the ship can mystify you at the most unexpected moments.
activities.introduction: The Charmer keeps you captivated with his impromptu magic performances around the ship.

activities.shortDescription: It's blinged and bing'd... with the Diva herself.
activities.longDescription: Let’s be clear — this isn’t your grandparents' bingo (but that's fun, too). No shade, but lots of tea here as the Diva hosts this raucous, uniquely Virgin, game of bingo. Make sure to arrive early to grab a card, a cocktail, and start the party. Oh, and don't forget... calling a false bingo will absolutely make you the Diva's latest plaything. Bingo card sales end 15 minutes prior to the event.
activities.introduction: The Diva is your hostess for this bingo event, but don’t let the sun-up-situation fool you—this is a full-blown party.
instructionDetails: Bingo card sales start prior to the event.
Bingo Card Sales end prior to the show.
Once show starts cards can no longer be purchased.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

activities.shortDescription: A musical duo playing the classics from every era.
activities.longDescription: Akimbo is a music duo from South Africa who embellish a broad variety of cover songs and original music. This unique duo will combine many different genres and eras, from the 60's to the present, with beautiful vocal harmonies, steel string guitars, ukulele, keyboard and an intricate percussion setup.
activities.introduction: This musical duo from South Africa will give you the best songs from the 60's to the present.

activities.shortDescription: Curated gaming pop-up at The Social Club.
activities.longDescription: Hosted by The Gamer, you'll have the opportunity to pick from their specially curated trunk of vintage, classic and ultra-modern games. From Cards Against Humanity® to Settlers of Catan® and everything in between and beyond, there’s a place (and game) for both the newbies and the serious players.
activities.introduction: Join The Gamer as we transform The Social Club into a pop-up board game café for a select few hours a day.

activities.displayName: Spill the Beans with Intelligentsia Coffee
activities.shortDescription: A steaming-hot cupping class.
activities.longDescription: Anyone can taste and compare coffee flavors — so we’re raising the (coffee) bar with an interactive cupping class for you to experience the tasting process used by industry professionals and transform your daily caffeine-fix ritual forever. Learn the nuances and intricacies of different hand-selected varieties from all around the world in an authentic cupping class curated by Intelligentsia Coffee.
activities.introduction: To bean or not to bean — that is the question.

activities.shortDescription: A pairing class that will elevate your taste buds.
activities.longDescription: Join us for a luxurious Champagne tasting experience. Savor three unique champagnes, paired perfectly with the classic and savory dish of fried chicken. Unleash your taste buds and indulge in a delightful and surprising pairing.
activities.introduction: Indulge in Bubbles & Bites: A Champagne & Fried Chicken Affair, a pairing class that will elevate your taste buds.

activities.shortDescription: Dance the night away to this party soul group.
activities.longDescription: A high-energy party soul group, Tapes is the best thing to come out of Australia since the Bunnings sausage sizzle. Their unique blend of disco, soul, RnB, funk, and hip-hop will keep you dancing until your feet are sore.
activities.introduction: Disco, soul, funk, RnB, and hip-hop - Tapes truly does it all.

activities.displayName: Stretch and Sculpt with The Balancer
activities.shortDescription: Learn breathing techniques to help you stretch.
activities.longDescription: Ready to feel relaxed and refreshed? Get ready for a rejuvenating holistic workout with The Balancer. You'll learn how to get a full body stretch through the use of breath, guided meditation, and safe postures, all while training your muscles at the same time. By the end, you'll feel like a brand new (and more relaxed) you.
activities.introduction: The Balancer will show you special breathing techniques to help you stretch the full body.

activities.shortDescription: An adept Celtic fiddler and singer-songwriter.
activities.longDescription: LaGrande honed her craft criss-crossing continents as a soloist with the National Dance Company of Ireland. She has toured across North America, Europe, UK, Asia and Russia. LaGrande is a highly sought after session player on the European festival circuit. She has performed with platinum selling rock band Kodaline on Ireland’s Late Late Show, Grammy nominated Hozier, and was a soloist with Mundy at the 3 Arena in Dublin.
activities.introduction: A Celtic fiddle player and vocalist based out of the West Coast of Ireland, Meg LaGrande has toured the world, from the Kremlin to the Vegas Strip.

activities.shortDescription: Meet new friends for the night ahead.
activities.longDescription: Your host for this event will kick things off by getting everyone acquainted — then, once you're cozy, sit back and enjoy a chill environment for drinks, games, and good times. We will let the group decide where the party takes you together. If things get a little rowdy, you're doing it right.
activities.introduction: If you're looking to add members to your going out squad, search no further — preGAME's got you covered.

activities.displayName: VV Cabaret: A Night of Love Songs
activities.shortDescription: Take a melodic journey through the book of love.
activities.longDescription: We've cultivated the ultimate vocal cabaret that paints the perfect picture of love. Take a journey with us through some fan favorite love songs, from classics to new age hits, there is a song to touch each Sailor’s inner romantic. Sit back and relax through the decades, celebrating love along the way.
activities.introduction: Join us while we sing some of your favorite heartfelt scores.

activities.shortDescription: Chapter One: Literary themes of fantasy & romance.
activities.longDescription: Bookworms beware: this after-hours literary affair won't resemble any experience you've had at a library. Lola — alongside a cast of characters like her nerdy assistant Dewey and Mary the bossy maid — will take you through the eclectic book collection of a mysterious Mr. Dick, a wide array including fantasy and fairy tales, crime, horror, and more. Somewhere between cocktail party and immersive cabaret, Lola's Library is an entire evening experience, so feel free to come and go as you please.
activities.introduction: Lola — resident librarian, vocalist, and comedienne — is the star of this cheeky, twisted cabaret featuring acrobats, dancers, and other surprises.

You’ll be welcomed to the Dock, which has been transformed into a celestial world, and our Astral Storyteller will begin recalling mythical stories found in the stars. Get completely lost in the night sky and find your way home at Stargazers.
activities.introduction: Venture out to sea and into the sky with this celestial and romantic evening regaling tales of the stars.

activities.shortDescription: An American Blues-Rock Band.
activities.longDescription: The Matt O'Ree Band is a couple-fronted band known for putting their own unique spin on blues-rock music while honoring the classics. Former touring guitarist for Bon Jovi, Matt won the "King of Blues" guitar contest hosted by BB King himself and was also inducted into the NY/NJ blues hall of fame. Matt’s wife Eryn, an accomplished artist and songwriter in her own right, won awards such as the BELK Southern Musician Blues and many more.
activities.introduction: The Matt O'Ree Band is a Blues-Rock band influenced by musical legends like the Allman Brothers, Led Zeppelin, Aretha Franklin, & more.

activities.displayName: Club Night Featuring Guest DJ Ella
activities.shortDescription: Soul, funk, and disco vibes elevate every hour.
activities.longDescription: Where music serves as a universal language, DJ Ella stands as a beacon of unity bringing people together through the power of sound. Hailing from the city of Brighton, UK, DJ Ella is synonymous with electrifying beats and seamless transitions, making her a sought-after name in the world of open format DJing. With a kaleidoscope of musical genres at her fingertips and an extensive collection that spans across eras and styles, DJ Ella has crafted unforgettable soundscapes for over a decade.
activities.introduction: From blissful summer days to celebratory nights, Ella Durston has blended a soundtrack to create your perfect atmospheric backdrop.

activities.shortDescription: Learn the fundamentals of a strong core workout.
activities.longDescription: Our core class teaches the fundamentals of a strong core, through a series of exercises designed to help strengthen your lower back and define your abs. You may not walk out with six-pack, but you’ll be one step closer.
activities.introduction: The onboard workout class that gives a little more to your core.
instructionDetails: A no-show fee of $10 - which will be donated to charity partners applies to all our fitness classes in not cancelled 24 hours prior to the class.

activities.displayName: Live Life Colorfully ft. the Art of Miriam Castillo
activities.shortDescription: Adult-painting party.
activities.longDescription: In this interactive experience with The Artist, you'll bring a black&white mural into full, technicolor life. This mural, created by NYC and Yucatán-based artist Miriam Castillo, was created for Virgin and features her style, celebrating the world by exploring its intersection with creation of art. It’s your job to bring it to life by coloring in (or outside of) lines. Feel free to sip on your choice of bevs and let the music inspire your vision… even if you’re not a renaissance artist.
activities.introduction: Light up the world and our ship with color, with this adult-painting party alongside our resident artist onboard.
instructionDetails: This event will run for 2 hours, so feel free to pop by anytime.

activities.shortDescription: 80s-inspired retro workout class in The Manor.
activities.longDescription: Come and get into the day-glow 80s groove. During this full-body workout, you’ll move and groove to a throwback soundtrack full of well-known, high-energy dance anthems to inspire everyone to “dance,” “with somebody,” or "feel the hee-eee-eeaat.”
activities.introduction: An over-the-top flash-back to the golden age of exercise videos and 80s personalities.
instructionDetails: Wear something to move in and close-toed shoes.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
